statements: SELECT * FROM solar_panel_efficiency_ratings ORDER BY efficiency_rating ASC;
SELECT panel_id, efficiency_rating FROM solar_panel_efficiency_ratings WHERE installation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT panel_id, installation_date FROM solar_panel_efficiency_ratings WHERE efficiency_rating >= 0.8 ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(efficiency_rating) AS highest_rating FROM solar_panel_efficiency_ratings;
SELECT AVG(efficiency_rating) AS average_rating FROM solar_panel_efficiency_ratings;
SELECT * FROM solar_panel_efficiency_ratings WHERE panel_id = 1;
SELECT efficiency_rating, installation_date FROM solar_panel_efficiency_ratings WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.9 ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT panel_id, efficiency_rating FROM solar_panel_efficiency_ratings WHERE installation_date > '2021-01-01' AND efficiency_rating BETWEEN 0.8 AND 1.0;
SELECT * FROM solar_panel_efficiency_ratings WHERE efficiency_rating < 0.7 OR installation_date < '2020-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT panel_id FROM solar_panel_efficiency_ratings ORDER BY panel_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels;
SELECT brand, efficiency_rating FROM SolarPanels ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceData WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT panel_id, brand FROM SolarPanels WHERE efficiency_rating >= 0.9 ORDER BY brand DESC;
SELECT panel_id, brand, efficiency_rating FROM SolarPanels WHERE brand LIKE 'Sun%' ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels
SELECT panel_id, brand FROM SolarPanels WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.5
SELECT * FROM PerformanceData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT brand, efficiency_rating FROM SolarPanels ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC
SELECT panel_id, efficiency FROM PerformanceData JOIN SolarPanels ON PerformanceData.panel_id = SolarPanels.panel_id
SELECT * FROM solar_panels;
SELECT panel_name, efficiency_rating FROM solar_panels WHERE panel_id = 1;
SELECT panel_name, energy_generated FROM solar_panels INNER JOIN panel_performance ON solar_panels.panel_id = panel_performance.panel_id;
SELECT panel_name, usage_hours FROM solar_panels INNER JOIN panel_usage ON solar_panels.panel_id = panel_usage.panel_id WHERE usage_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT panel_id, MAX(energy_generated) AS max_energy_generated FROM panel_performance GROUP BY panel_id ORDER BY max_energy_generated DESC;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8;
SELECT panel_id, panel_name, efficiency_rating FROM solar_panels WHERE efficiency_rating < 0.5;
SELECT panel_id, panel_name, efficiency_rating FROM solar_panels ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM panel_performance WHERE energy_generated > 100;
SELECT panel_id, performance_date, energy_generated FROM panel_performance WHERE performance_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM panel_manufacturer;
SELECT manufacturer_name FROM panel_manufacturer ORDER BY manufacturer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM panel_rating WHERE production_year > 2010;
SELECT panel_id, efficiency_rating, production_year FROM panel_rating WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.18;
SELECT location_name, installation_date FROM panel_location WHERE installation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM panel_manufacturer ORDER BY manufacturer_name DESC;
SELECT panel_id, efficiency_rating, production_year FROM panel_rating WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.18 ORDER BY production_year ASC;
SELECT panel_id, installation_date, location_name FROM panel_location WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT performance_id, panel_id, performance_date, efficiency_measurement FROM panel_performance WHERE efficiency_measurement < 0.75 ORDER BY performance_id DESC;

SELECT manufacturer_name, COUNT(panel_id) AS panel_count FROM panel_manufacturer JOIN panel_rating ON panel_manufacturer.manufacturer_id = panel_rating.manufacturer_id GROUP BY manufacturer_name ORDER BY panel_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanelEfficiencyRatings WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Solar'
SELECT efficiency_rating, installation_date FROM SolarPanelEfficiencyRatings WHERE country_of_origin = 'USA'
SELECT panel_id, efficiency_rating FROM SolarPanelEfficiencyRatings WHERE installation_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM SolarPanelEfficiencyRatings WHERE country_of_origin = 'China' ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC
SELECT manufacturer, country_of_origin FROM SolarPanelEfficiencyRatings ORDER BY installation_date ASC
SELECT * FROM SolarPanelEfficiencyRatings WHERE manufacturer='ABC Solar' ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT panel_id, efficiency_rating, installation_date FROM SolarPanelEfficiencyRatings WHERE country_of_origin='USA' ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC, installation_date;
SELECT panel_id, manufacturer, country_of_origin FROM SolarPanelEfficiencyRatings WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01' AND efficiency_rating > 20;
SELECT panel_id, efficiency_rating FROM SolarPanelEfficiencyRatings WHERE country_of_origin='Germany' AND manufacturer='XYZ Solar' ORDER BY panel_id;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS panel_count FROM SolarPanelEfficiencyRatings GROUP BY manufacturer HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY panel_count DESC;
